mentions.context: DevRate and manipulate packages were used to obtain this set of initial parameter values and ensure that the estimation did not correspond to a local minimum for the least square method.
We are grateful to François Rebaudo for his help on the use of the DevRate package.
Subsequently, 37 non-linear equations from the literature [available in the DevRate R package (Rebaudo et al., 2018)] were fitted to development rates to determine the best fit for each stage.
